keyMoments.title: Attack on the Thousand Sunny
keyMoments.description: The Breed Pirates, led by their captain with an army of controlled Sea Lapahns, launch a surprise attack on the Straw Hat Pirates' ship.
keyMoments.significance: Initiates the central conflict of the Caesar Retrieval Arc.

keyMoments.title: Successfully Kidnap Caesar Clown
keyMoments.description: Breed accomplishes his objective of capturing the scientist Caesar Clown from the Straw Hat-Heart alliance.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the Breed Pirates as a credible threat and drives the arc's plot.

trivia: Breed's original human crew mutinied and abandoned him, leading him to prefer controlling animals as his crew instead.
The Breed Pirates are connected to the Underworld and are aware of Doflamingo's SMILE fruit operations.
This is an anime-only crew created for the Caesar Retrieval filler arc.

keyMoments.title: Sea Animal Pirates Debut
keyMoments.description: The crew appears under Breed's control, with their captain, the Kung Fu Dugong, stopping Luffy's attack with Armament Haki.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals that the Kung Fu Dugong formed his own pirate crew and reached the New World.

keyMoments.title: Crew's Journey Explained
keyMoments.description: The Kung Fu Dugong explains that he was inspired by Luffy to become a pirate, formed a crew of sea animals, and successfully reached the New World before being enslaved by Breed.
keyMoments.significance: Provides backstory for the crew's formation and current predicament.

trivia: This crew is composed entirely of sea animals, making it unique among pirate crews.
The captain learned Armament Haki, making him the second animal shown using Haki in the series.
The crew was inspired to form after their captain was defeated by Luffy in Alabasta and heard his words about freedom and adventure.
They successfully reached the New World, demonstrating significant strength for an all-animal crew.
This is an anime-only crew and is not considered canon to the manga.
